summary: A 36 foot crocodile goes on the rampage in Beijing after being moved from a peaceful Crocodile Farm and onto the menu of a local gangster.
cast: Barbie Hsu|Tao Guo|Zhaoqi Shi|Suet Lam|Xin Xin Xiong|Jiali Ding|Purba Rgyal|Qingzhuo Fang|Jinsong Wang|Qinqin Li|Hou Chuan-Gao|Long Ren|Jin Che|Yonggang Huang|Guo Chao|Kate Hawkins|Heath Pennington
director: Director: Lisheng Lin (as Li Sheng Lin)
title: Croczilla
